1.verse: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

2.verse: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

3.verse: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

4.verse: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.

5.verse: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

6.verse: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.

7.verse: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?

8.verse: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,

9.verse: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.

10.verse: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

11.verse: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.

12.verse: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
